1195900.name: RPG Maker MV - Monster Girl Walking Sprite
1195900.description:
Let your monsters get out and strut their stuff with this new pack from Gee kun soft, featuring 32 walking sprites for lots of different monster characters including Beasts, Chimera, Harpys, Medusas, Minotaur, Vampire, and many other of the most popular and dreaded monsters our mythologies have ever known!

If you want to add more NPCs to your expanding games, this is a must-have additional mini pack for you. These cute pixel characters are sure to brighten up your fantasy world with a bit of scary, female anime character charm!

Features:

* 32 Walking Sprites
* Many common and popular well known mythological monsters
* Royalty Free monster sprites to use in your games
* For use in RPG Maker MV or the engine of your choice
1195900.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 日语, 韩语, 繁体中文, 阿拉伯语, 简体中文
